description: The Pizza Company makes wood fired goodness mobile to the Sacramento area. The pizza is made with fresh, local, and often organic ingredients. They start with dough made with a blend of "00" unbleached flour, a high-quality European-style flour and white whole wheat flour from Central Milling in Petaluma. The menu is ever-changing, with toppings including gorgonzola, caramelized onions, smoked mozzarella, salami, spinach, and fennel sausage. Try their weekly "Market Pizza" featuring produce from the farmers market.
name: The Pizza Company
